name: able
definition: Having the power, skill, means, or opportunity to do something.

name: ably
definition: In a competent or skillful way.

name: area
definition: A region or part of a town, a country, or the world.

name: axis
definition: An imaginary line about which a body rotates.

name: baby

name: back
definition: The rear surface of the human body from the shoulders to the hips.

definition: The temporary release of an accused person awaiting trial, sometimes on condition that a sum of money be lodged to guarantee their appearance in court.

definition: To cook food by dry heat without direct exposure to a flame, typically in an oven.

name: bald
definition: Having a scalp wholly or partly lacking hair.

name: bark

name: barn

name: base

name: beak

name: bear

definition: To use the teeth to cut into something in order to eat it.

name: blue

definition: Showing a lack of concentration on what is happening around one.

name: academical
definition: Relating to an academy or other institution of learning.

name: accelerate
definition: To begin to move more quickly.

name: acceptance
definition: The action of consenting to receive or undertake something offered.

name: accessible
definition: Able to be reached or entered.

name: accidental
definition: Happening by chance, unintentionally, or unexpectedly.

name: accomplish
definition: To achieve or complete successfully.

name: accomptant
definition: An archaic spelling of accountant.

name: accountant
definition: A person whose profession is to inspect, keep, or audit accounts.

name: adaptation
definition: The action or process of adapting or being adapted.

name: additional
definition: Added, extra, or supplementary to what is already present or available.

name: allocation
definition: The action or process of distributing something.

name: apostrophe
definition: A punctuation mark used to indicate either possession or the omission of letters or numbers.

name: appearance
definition: The way that someone or something looks.

name: assessment
definition: The evaluation or estimation of the nature, quality, or ability of someone or something.

name: attractive
definition: Pleasing or appealing to the senses.

name: background
definition: The part of a picture, scene, or design that forms a setting for the main figures or objects.

name: beneficial
definition: Favorable or advantageous; resulting in good.

name: biographic
definition: Relating to the details of a person's life.

name: birthplace
definition: The place where a person was born.

name: bookholder
definition: A device for holding a book open.

name: bridegroom
definition: A man on his wedding day or just before and after the event.

name: capitalist
definition: A wealthy person who uses money to invest in trade and industry for profit.

name: ceremonial
definition: Relating to or used for formal events of a religious or public nature.

name: chargeless
definition: Having no electrical charge.

name: checkmated
definition: Placed a king in checkmate.

name: chevisance
definition: An unlawful agreement or contract, especially one involving usury.

name: cognizance
definition: Knowledge or awareness.

name: collateral
definition: Something pledged as security for repayment of a loan, to be forfeited in the event of a default.

name: commandery
definition: A district under the administration of a commander of a military order.

name: competency
definition: The ability to do something successfully or efficiently.

name: complement
definition: A thing that completes or brings to perfection.

name: complicate
definition: To make something more difficult or confusing by causing it to be more complex.

name: compounder
definition: A person who mixes ingredients to create a composite substance.

name: compressor
definition: A device for compressing something, especially air.

name: conception
definition: The action of conceiving a child or of a child being conceived.

name: conclusion
definition: The end or finish of an event or process.

name: conference
definition: A formal meeting for discussion.

name: confession
definition: A formal statement admitting that one is guilty of a crime.

name: confidence
definition: The feeling or belief that one can rely on someone or something; firm trust.

name: connection
definition: A relationship in which a person, thing, or idea is linked or associated with something else.

name: consequent
definition: Following as a result or effect.

name: consistent
definition: Acting or done in the same way over time, especially so as to be fair or accurate.

name: controller
definition: A person or thing that directs or regulates something.

name: convention
definition: A way in which something is usually done, especially within a particular area or activity.

name: coordinate
definition: To bring the different elements of a complex activity or organization into a harmonious relationship.

name: countryman
definition: A person from the same country as oneself.

name: cumulative
definition: Increasing or increased in quantity, degree, or force by successive additions.

name: decolorate
definition: To remove color from; to bleach.

name: abstraction
definition: The quality of dealing with ideas rather than events.

name: accelerator
definition: A device for increasing the speed of a vehicle's engine.

name: achievement
definition: A thing done successfully, typically by effort, courage, or skill.

name: acknowledge
definition: To accept or admit the existence or truth of.

name: advertising
definition: The activity of producing advertisements for commercial products or services.

name: affectation
definition: Behavior, speech, or writing that is artificial and designed to impress.

name: affirmative
definition: Agreeing with a statement or to a request.

name: alternative
definition: One of two or more available possibilities.

name: anniversary
definition: The date on which an event took place in a previous year.

name: appointment
definition: An arrangement to meet someone at a particular time and place.

name: appropriate
definition: Suitable or proper in the circumstances.

name: approximate
definition: Close to the actual, but not completely accurate or exact.

name: arrangement
definition: The action, process, or result of arranging or being arranged.

name: automatical
definition: An archaic form of automatic.

name: centrifugal
definition: Moving or tending to move away from a center.

name: centripetal
definition: Moving or tending to move toward a center.

name: ceremonious
definition: Relating or appropriate to grand and formal occasions.

name: certificate
definition: An official document attesting a certain fact.

name: circulation
definition: Movement to and fro or around something, especially that of fluid in a closed system.

name: coefficient
definition: A numerical or constant quantity placed before and multiplying the variable in an algebraic expression.

name: coffeehouse
definition: A coffee shop.

name: combination
definition: A joining or merging of different parts or qualities in which the component elements are individually distinct.

name: comfortable
definition: Providing physical ease and relaxation.

name: communicate
definition: To share or exchange information, news, or ideas.

name: comparative
definition: Perceptible by comparison; relative.

name: composition
definition: The nature of something's ingredients or constituents; the way in which a whole or mixture is made up.

name: conditional
definition: Subject to one or more conditions or requirements being met.

name: consequence
definition: A result or effect of an action or condition.

name: defenseless
definition: Without defense or protection; totally vulnerable.

name: determinant
definition: A factor which decisively affects the nature or outcome of something.

name: development
definition: The process of developing or being developed.

name: diagnostics
definition: The practice or techniques of diagnosis.

name: differently
definition: In a way that is not the same as another or as before.

name: dimensional
definition: Relating to measurement in a particular direction.

name: disapointed
definition: A common misspelling of disappointed.

name: distraction
definition: A thing that prevents someone from giving full attention to something else.

name: domesticate
definition: To tame an animal and keep it as a pet or for farm produce.

name: duplication
definition: The action or process of duplicating something.

name: educational
definition: Relating to the provision of education.

name: efficiently
definition: In a way that achieves maximum productivity with minimum wasted effort or expense.

name: elimination
definition: The complete removal or destruction of something.

name: embracement
definition: The act of accepting or supporting a belief, theory, or change willingly and enthusiastically.

name: engineering
definition: The branch of science and technology concerned with the design, building, and use of engines, machines, and structures.

name: equivalence
definition: The condition of being equal or equivalent in value, function, or meaning.

name: exterminate
definition: To destroy completely.

name: extravagant
definition: Lacking restraint in spending money or using resources.

name: fantastical
definition: Based on or existing only in fantasy; unreal.

name: flexibility
definition: The quality of bending easily without breaking.

name: formulation
definition: The action of creating or preparing something.

name: gastromancy
definition: Divination from the sounds or signs of the belly.
